name: Renforcer la démocratie ainsi que la liberté et le pluralisme des médias dans l’UE - Strengthening democracy, media freedom and pluralism in the EU - Stärkung der Demokratie, der Medienfreiheit und des Medienpluralismus in der EU -  - Tiemo Wölken,  Roberta Metsola - § 1/1
title: Strengthening Democracy and Media Freedom and Pluralism in the EU: the undue use of actions under civil and criminal law to silence journalists, NGOs and civil society
